18  package org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.cache.checker;
19

23  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.config.props.ConfigurationProperties;
24  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.database.type.DatabaseType;
25  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.instance.ComputeNodeInstance;
26  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.instance.InstanceContext;
27  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.metadata.ShardingSphereMetaData;
28  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.metadata.database.ShardingSphereDatabase;
29  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.metadata.database.resource.ShardingSphereResourceMetaData;
30  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.metadata.database.rule.ShardingSphereRuleMetaData;

32  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.metadata.database.schema.model.ShardingSphereSchema;

34  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.parser.sql.SQLStatementParserEngine;
35  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.util.spi.type.typed.TypedSPILoader;
36  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.api.config.ShardingRuleConfiguration;
37  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.api.config.rule.ShardingTableReferenceRuleConfiguration;
38  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.api.config.rule.ShardingTableRuleConfiguration;
39  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.api.config.strategy.sharding.StandardShardingStrategyConfiguration;
40  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.cache.api.ShardingCacheOptions;
41  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.cache.api.ShardingCacheRuleConfiguration;
42  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.cache.rule.ShardingCacheRule;
43  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.rule.ShardingRule;
44  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.api.CacheOption;
45  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sql.common.statement.SQLStatement;
46  import org.apache.shardingsphere.test.util.PropertiesBuilder;
47  import org.apache.shardingsphere.test.util.PropertiesBuilder.Property;
48  import org.apache.shardingsphere.timeservice.api.config.TimeServiceRuleConfiguration;
49  import org.apache.shardingsphere.timeservice.core.rule.TimeServiceRule;
50  import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext;
51  import org.junit.jupiter.params.ParameterizedTest;
52  import org.junit.jupiter.params.provider.Arguments;
53  import org.junit.jupiter.params.provider.ArgumentsProvider;
54  import org.junit.jupiter.params.provider.ArgumentsSource;
55  
56  import java.sql.Types;
57  import java.util.Arrays;
58  import java.util.Collection;
59  import java.util.Collections;
60  import java.util.List;
61  import java.util.Properties;
62  import java.util.function.Function;
63  import java.util.stream.Stream;
64  
65  import static org.hamcrest.CoreMatchers.is;
66  import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
67  import static org.mockito.Mockito.mock;
68  
69  class ShardingRouteCacheableCheckerTest {
70      
71      private static final String DATABASE_NAME = "sharding_db";
72      
73      private static final String SCHEMA_NAME = "public";
74      
75      @ParameterizedTest(name = "probably cacheable: {2}, SQL: {0}")
76      @ArgumentsSource(TestCaseArgumentsProvider.class)
77      void assertCheckCacheable(final String sql, final List<Object> parameters, final boolean expectedProbablyCacheable, final List<Integer> expectedShardingConditionParameterMarkerIndexes) {
78          ShardingRule shardingRule = createShardingRule();
79          ShardingCacheRule shardingCacheRule = createShardingCacheRule(shardingRule);
80          TimeServiceRule timeServiceRule = createTimeServiceRule();
81          ShardingSphereDatabase database = createDatabase(shardingRule, shardingCacheRule, timeServiceRule);
82          ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult actual = new ShardingRouteCacheableChecker(shardingCacheRule).check(database, createQueryContext(database, sql, parameters));
83          assertThat(actual.isProbablyCacheable(), is(expectedProbablyCacheable));
84          assertThat(actual.getShardingConditionParameterMarkerIndexes(), is(expectedShardingConditionParameterMarkerIndexes));
85      }
86      
87      private ShardingRule createShardingRule() {
88          ShardingRuleConfiguration ruleConfig = new ShardingRuleConfiguration();
89          ruleConfig.getBroadcastTables().add("t_broadcast_table");
90          ruleConfig.getBindingTableGroups().add(new ShardingTableReferenceRuleConfiguration("foo", "t_order,t_order_item"));
91          ruleConfig.getShardingAlgorithms().put("mod", new AlgorithmConfiguration("MOD", PropertiesBuilder.build(new Property("sharding-count", "2"))));
92          ruleConfig.getShardingAlgorithms().put("inline", new AlgorithmConfiguration("INLINE", PropertiesBuilder.build(new Property("algorithm-expression", "ds_${id % 2}"))));
93          ruleConfig.setDefaultDatabaseShardingStrategy(new StandardShardingStrategyConfiguration("warehouse_id", "mod"));
94          ShardingTableRuleConfiguration warehouse = new ShardingTableRuleConfiguration("t_warehouse", "ds_${0..1}.t_warehouse");
95          warehouse.setDatabaseShardingStrategy(new StandardShardingStrategyConfiguration("id", "mod"));
96          ruleConfig.getTables().add(warehouse);
97          ruleConfig.getTables().add(new ShardingTableRuleConfiguration("t_order", "ds_${0..1}.t_order"));
98          ruleConfig.getTables().add(new ShardingTableRuleConfiguration("t_order_item", "ds_${0..1}.t_order_item"));
99          ShardingTableRuleConfiguration nonCacheableDatabaseSharding = new ShardingTableRuleConfiguration("t_non_cacheable_database_sharding", "ds_${0..1}.t_non_cacheable_database_sharding");
100         nonCacheableDatabaseSharding.setDatabaseShardingStrategy(new StandardShardingStrategyConfiguration("id", "inline"));
101         ruleConfig.getTables().add(nonCacheableDatabaseSharding);
102         ShardingTableRuleConfiguration nonCacheableTableSharding = new ShardingTableRuleConfiguration("t_non_cacheable_table_sharding", "ds_0.t_non_cacheable_table_sharding_${0..1}");
103         nonCacheableTableSharding.setTableShardingStrategy(new StandardShardingStrategyConfiguration("id", "inline"));
104         ruleConfig.getTables().add(nonCacheableTableSharding);
105         return new ShardingRule(ruleConfig, Arrays.asList("ds_0", "ds_1"), new InstanceContext(mock(ComputeNodeInstance.class), props -> 0, null, null, null, null));
106     }
107     
108     private ShardingCacheRule createShardingCacheRule(final ShardingRule shardingRule) {
109         return new ShardingCacheRule(new ShardingCacheRuleConfiguration(100, new ShardingCacheOptions(true, 0, 0)), shardingRule,
110                 new TimeServiceRule(new TimeServiceRuleConfiguration("System", new Properties())));
111     }
112     
113     private TimeServiceRule createTimeServiceRule() {
114         return new TimeServiceRule(new TimeServiceRuleConfiguration("System", new Properties()));
115     }
116     
117     private ShardingSphereDatabase createDatabase(final ShardingRule shardingRule, final ShardingCacheRule shardingCacheRule, final TimeServiceRule timeServiceRule) {
118         ShardingSphereSchema schema = new ShardingSphereSchema();
119         schema.getTables().put("t_broadcast_table", new ShardingSphereTable("t_broadcast_table", Arrays.asList(
120                 new ShardingSphereColumn("broadcast_table_id", Types.INTEGER, true, false, false, true, false),
121                 new ShardingSphereColumn("broadcast_table_col1", Types.VARCHAR, false, false, false, true, false)),
122                 Collections.emptyList(), Collections.emptyList()));
123         schema.getTables().put("t_warehouse", new ShardingSphereTable("t_warehouse",
124                 Collections.singletonList(new ShardingSphereColumn("id", Types.INTEGER, true, false, false, true, false)),
125                 Collections.emptyList(), Collections.emptyList()));
126         schema.getTables().put("t_order", new ShardingSphereTable("t_order", Arrays.asList(
127                 new ShardingSphereColumn("warehouse_id", Types.INTEGER, false, false, false, true, false),
128                 new ShardingSphereColumn("order_id", Types.INTEGER, true, false, false, true, false)),
129                 Collections.emptyList(), Collections.emptyList()));
130         schema.getTables().put("t_order_item", new ShardingSphereTable("t_order_item", Arrays.asList(
131                 new ShardingSphereColumn("warehouse_id", Types.INTEGER, false, false, false, true, false),
132                 new ShardingSphereColumn("order_broadcast_table_id", Types.INTEGER, true, false, false, true, false)),
133                 Collections.emptyList(), Collections.emptyList()));
134         return new ShardingSphereDatabase(DATABASE_NAME, TypedSPILoader.getService(DatabaseType.class, "PostgreSQL"),
135                 new ShardingSphereResourceMetaData(DATABASE_NAME, Collections.emptyMap()), new ShardingSphereRuleMetaData(Arrays.asList(shardingRule, shardingCacheRule, timeServiceRule)),
136                 Collections.singletonMap(SCHEMA_NAME, schema));
137     }
138     
139     private QueryContext createQueryContext(final ShardingSphereDatabase database, final String sql, final List<Object> params) {
140         return new QueryContext(SQLStatementContextFactory.newInstance(createShardingSphereMetaData(database), params, parse(sql), DATABASE_NAME), sql, params);
141     }
142     
143     private ShardingSphereMetaData createShardingSphereMetaData(final ShardingSphereDatabase database) {
144         return new ShardingSphereMetaData(Collections.singletonMap(DATABASE_NAME, database), mock(ShardingSphereRuleMetaData.class), mock(ConfigurationProperties.class));
145     }
146     
147     private SQLStatement parse(final String sql) {
148         CacheOption cacheOption = new CacheOption(0, 0);
149         return new SQLStatementParserEngine("PostgreSQL", cacheOption, cacheOption, false).parse(sql, false);
150     }
151     
152     private static class TestCaseArgumentsProvider implements ArgumentsProvider {
153         
154         @Override
155         public Stream<? extends Arguments> provideArguments(final ExtensionContext extensionContext) {
156             Collection<? extends Arguments> probablyCacheableCases = Arrays.asList(
157                     Arguments.of("insert into t_broadcast_table (broadcast_table_id, broadcast_table_col1) values (?, ?)", Arrays.asList(1, "foo"), true, Collections.emptyList()),
158                     Arguments.of("insert into t_warehouse (id) values (?)", Collections.singletonList(1), true, Collections.singletonList(0)),
159                     Arguments.of("select * from t_warehouse where id = ?", Collections.singletonList(1), true, Collections.singletonList(0)),
160                     Arguments.of("select * from t_warehouse where id in (?, ?, ?)", Arrays.asList(1, 2, 3), true, Arrays.asList(0, 1, 2)),
161                     Arguments.of("select * from t_warehouse where id between ? and ?", Arrays.asList(1, 10), true, Arrays.asList(0, 1)),
162                     Arguments.of("select * from t_warehouse where id between ? and ? limit ? offset ?", Arrays.asList(1, 10, 100, 50), true, Arrays.asList(0, 1)),
163                     Arguments.of("update t_broadcast_table set broadcast_table_col1 = ?", Collections.singletonList(0), true, Collections.emptyList()),
164                     Arguments.of("update t_broadcast_table set broadcast_table_col1 = ? where broadcast_table_id = ?", Arrays.asList(0, 1), true, Collections.emptyList()),
165                     Arguments.of("update t_warehouse set warehouse_name = ? where id = ?", Arrays.asList("foo", 1), true, Collections.singletonList(1)),
166                     Arguments.of("delete from t_broadcast_table", Collections.emptyList(), true, Collections.emptyList()),
167                     Arguments.of("delete from t_warehouse where id = ?", Collections.singletonList(1), true, Collections.singletonList(0)));
168             Collection<? extends Arguments> nonCacheableCases = Arrays.asList(
169                     Arguments.of("create table t_warehouse (id int4 not null primary key)", Collections.emptyList(), false, Collections.emptyList()),
170                     Arguments.of("insert into t_warehouse (id) select warehouse_id from t_order", Collections.emptyList(), false, Collections.emptyList()),
171                     Arguments.of("insert into t_broadcast_table (broadcast_table_id, broadcast_table_col1) values (?, ?), (?, ?)", Arrays.asList(1, "foo", 2, "bar"), false, Collections.emptyList()),
172                     Arguments.of("insert into t_warehouse (id) values (?), (?)", Arrays.asList(1, 2), false, Collections.emptyList()),
173                     Arguments.of("insert into t_non_sharding_table (id) values (?)", Collections.singletonList(1), false, Collections.emptyList()),
174                     Arguments.of("insert into t_non_cacheable_database_sharding (id) values (?)", Collections.singletonList(1), false, Collections.emptyList()),
175                     Arguments.of("insert into t_non_cacheable_table_sharding (id) values (?)", Collections.singletonList(1), false, Collections.emptyList()),
176                     Arguments.of("insert into t_warehouse (id) values (now())", Collections.emptyList(), false, Collections.emptyList()),
177                     Arguments.of("select * from t_broadcast_table where broadcast_table_id = ?", Collections.singletonList(1), false, Collections.emptyList()),
178                     Arguments.of("select * from t_warehouse w join t_order o on w.id = o.warehouse_id where w.id = ?", Collections.singletonList(1), false, Collections.emptyList()),
179                     Arguments.of("update t_warehouse set warehouse_name = ? where id = (select max(warehouse_id) from t_order)", Collections.singletonList("foo"), false, Collections.emptyList()),
180                     Arguments.of("delete from t_order where warehouse_id in (1, 2, now())", Collections.emptyList(), false, Collections.emptyList()),
181                     Arguments.of("delete from t_order where warehouse_id between now() and now()", Collections.emptyList(), false, Collections.emptyList()),
182                     Arguments.of("delete from t_order o where o.warehouse_id in (select w.id from t_warehouse w)", Collections.emptyList(), false, Collections.emptyList()));
183             return Stream.of(probablyCacheableCases.stream(), nonCacheableCases.stream()).flatMap(Function.identity());
184         }
185     }
186 }
